com.github.battleship

Class BoatBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.battleship.BoatBoard

  • public class BoatBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent all of the boats for either the Player or AI Has method to place a boat on a board at random remove one, or add one manually, etc.
    Author:
    kbagal

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoatBoard()
      Default constructor used for AI since AI doesn't have boats to start
      BoatBoard(com.github.battleship.Boat b1, com.github.battleship.Boat b2, com.github.battleship.Boat b3, com.github.battleship.Boat b4, com.github.battleship.Boat b5)
      Constructs a new BoatBoard Object used for Player since it has locations already

        public boolean hasHit(com.github.battleship.Location attemptToHit)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        boolean if true or not

      • removeLoc

        public void removeLoc(com.github.battleship.Location attemptToHit)
        Method to remove a hit location from a boat Precondition: attemptToHit.hasHit() == true
        Parameters:
        attemptToHit - hit location

      • ifDeadThenRemove

        public void ifDeadThenRemove()
        Method to remove any boats that have no hittable sports left will ultimately leave array empty at the end

      • numBoats

        public int numBoats()
        Assessor method for num of boats left Used to tell if boats are dead
        Returns:
        number of boats (if 0 then dead)

      • placeBoat

        public void placeBoat(int length)
        Method to place a boat of a given length into a random place in the board used only in AI.java
        Parameters:
        length - length of boat to be placed

      • locAlreadyUsed

        public boolean locAlreadyUsed(com.github.battleship.Location locTest)
        Method to find if a given location is already being used by another boat or not This is a helped method for placeBoat()
        Parameters:
        locTest - the location to test if placed or not
        Returns:
        boolean if location used or not
